short_summary: single contract for disposal service in Ottawa, Ontario
description: Department of National Defence seeks a bid for disposal of tritium contaminated parts, with a clear RFP.
full_summary:
ife = Disposal of Tritium Contaminated Parts
=====================================================

**Tender Notice**
---------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested suppliers to participate in the Request for Proposal (RFP) for the disposal of tritium contaminated parts in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Tender Details**
------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01004612
*   **Solicitation Number:** 2021-08057
*   **Publication Date:** August 17, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** August 31, 2022, 14:00:00
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Requirements**
--------------

The DND requires a supplier to dispose of tritium contaminated parts in Ottawa, Ontario. The detailed requirement is outlined in the RFP document.

**Submission Information**
------------------------

*   **RFP Documents:**
    *   English: [Download the RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/90854b7168796667a5fbc80afb83b582/2021-08057_rfp_english.pdf)
    *   French: [Télécharger le document de DP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/eaa1114862d93ac653c7ed7f8bc232a0/2021-08057_rfp_french.pdf)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Tim Harcoff
    *   Email: <tim.harcoff@forces.gc.ca>
    *   Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
*   **Note:** The tender has expired. No further submissions will be accepted. )END-OF-SUBMISSION-INFORMATION---------------

Please ensure to thoroughly review the RFP document and follow the provided submission instructions. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact the contact person. 

**Civil Notice Release Not withstanding Prior Approval**
-------------------------------------------------

Procurement activities conducted under this announcement are publicly disclosed. This disclosure is unilaterally extended by the digit age of the contract, in light of public communication. The bidder must consider that listament Spend makes an the Benjamin DS L segment compared
